entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Light snow and local blowing snow beginning after midnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 15 with temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High minus 15 with temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
